name: Snake Plant
description: A hardy plant that tolerates low light and infrequent watering. Great for beginners and improves indoor air quality.

name: Peace Lily
description: Known for its beautiful white blooms, the Peace Lily thrives in low light and helps purify the air.

name: Spider Plant
description: An easy-to-grow plant with arching leaves and baby plantlets. Tolerates a range of conditions and is pet-friendly.

name: Pothos
description: A versatile vine that thrives in various light conditions. Great for hanging baskets or as a climbing plant.

name: ZZ Plant
description: A tough plant that can survive neglect and low light. Its glossy leaves add a touch of elegance to any space.

name: Rubber Plant
description: A popular indoor plant with large, glossy leaves. It thrives in bright light and can grow quite tall.

name: Aloe Vera
description: A succulent known for its medicinal properties. It requires bright light and infrequent watering.
soil: Cactus mix or well-draining potting mix

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: A trendy plant with large, violin-shaped leaves. It prefers bright light and consistent watering.

name: Boston Fern
description: A lush, feathery fern that thrives in humid conditions. It prefers indirect light and regular watering.

name: Dracaena
description: A diverse group of plants with striking foliage. They are easy to care for and adapt to various light conditions.

name: Chinese Evergreen
description: A hardy plant with attractive leaves. It thrives in low light and is known for its air-purifying qualities.

name: Cast Iron Plant
description: A resilient plant that can tolerate neglect and low light. Its dark green leaves add a touch of elegance.

name: Philodendron
description: A popular houseplant with heart-shaped leaves. It thrives in various light conditions and is easy to care for.

name: Calathea
description: Known for its striking leaf patterns, the Calathea prefers indirect light and high humidity.

name: Orchid
description: A beautiful flowering plant that thrives in bright, indirect light. Requires specific care for optimal blooming.
soil: Orchid mix or well-draining potting mix

name: Bamboo Palm
description: A tropical palm that thrives in low light and adds a touch of the tropics to your home.

name: Money Tree
description: A popular houseplant believed to bring good luck and prosperity. It thrives in bright, indirect light.

name: Dracaena Marginata
description: A striking plant with long, slender leaves. It is easy to care for and adapts well to various light conditions.

name: Parlor Palm
description: A small palm that thrives in low light and is perfect for indoor spaces. It adds a tropical feel to your home.

name: Cast Iron Plant
description: A resilient plant that can tolerate neglect and low light. Its dark green leaves add a touch of elegance.
